dbclasses

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbclasses.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Database.java This class handles all of the operations necessary to handle the creation, insertion, deletion, and updates of the file directory database system for the Gradebook application. This includes the above methods as they pertain to semesters, courses, assignments, rubrics, students, and individual grades.
    Since:
    10/15/2016
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gabriel Miller

      • addStudent

        public void addStudent(java.lang.String semester,
                       java.lang.String course,
                       java.lang.String studentID,
                       java.lang.String fName,
                       java.lang.String lName,
                       java.lang.String mName,
                       java.lang.String columnCount,
                       boolean NEW_COURSE)
        Adds a student to the directory.
        Parameters:
        semester - current semester
        course - current course
        studentID - unique ID for the student
        fName - student first name
        lName - student last name
        mName - student middle name
        columnCount - number of columns in the "assignments" file
        NEW_COURSE - flag that is set to true if the course to which the student is being added is a new course
